oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Civil War veteran Robert Laird Evans and family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy print of Confederate veteran, Capt. Robert Laird Evans, Co. I, 53rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, seated with his wife, Delilah Angus Evans, three unidentified women, and one child. Evans was taken prisoner at Fort Donelson and sent to Johnson's Island Prison (Ohio).
